data.title: Getting Started
data.body:
[Manic][manic] is a simple and flexible clientside framework. 

# Features and Benefits: 

---
Great for use cases where you don't have access to your `.htaccess` file.

More details coming soon...

# Organizing files:

---
```
<manic>/
  <data>/
    <js>/
```
# Posting articles:

---
coming soon...
